title: Usage Example​
content: The imported asset is now available for use. -- Reference folder with utilities: local Utilities = require(game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")).CryptUtil -- Require the utility modules: local Queue = require(Utilities.Queue) -- Use the modules: local testQueue = Queue.new() testQueue:setFunc(function(...) print("Received:", ...) end) testQueue:run("Hi!") testQueue:run(2 + 12) testQueue:run(false)

title: Example Usage​
content: local queue = Queue.new() queue:setFunc(function(...) print("Received:", ...) end) queue:run("Hi!") queue:run(2 + 12) queue:run(false)

title: Queue.new()​
content: Queue.new() --> NewQueue  Constructs a new queue.

title: NewQueue:setFunc()​
content: Queue:setFunc(function(...) -- code here end)  Sets the function which will be ran on each item in the queue once at a time.

title: NewQueue:run()​
content: Queue:run(...) --> any? : any  Adds a new item to the queue, which is set to run with the specified arguments.
